name: Get Out Of The Maze!!
description:
Get out of the maze in 5 minutes and run away from your enemies. You can shoot them but pay attention to the number of your bullets.your 

When I began my project I decided to make a puzzle gamewith UE4  and I came up with some ideas.

  • Find keys→ Enable boxes→ Sokoban games.
  • Maze→ Find keys.
  • Maze→ Sokoban games
  • Visual + Hearing puzzle, like rearranging notes to make a song.
  • Parallax principle→ Sokoban games
  • Word games like riddles and letters rearrangement.

Finally, I decided to develop a  game 

that combines fps and maze. Since I have some interest in puzzle games and fps.Owing to my limited programming skills,  there are some functions I couldn't develop though I try to solve problems.  For example, I tried to make the AI attack the player but it doesn't work and I couldn't figure out which part is wrong.
